keyMoments.title: Hammond Confronts the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Hammond, riding on sea beasts with other New Fish-Man Pirates members, intercepts the Straw Hat Pirates at Fish-Man Island's entrance and reveals knowledge of their past actions.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Hammond, introducing him as a member of the New Fish-Man Pirates and establishing the hostile reception awaiting the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: You're the Straw Hat Pirates who crushed Arlong's ambitions!

keyMoments.title: Hammond Issues Ultimatum
keyMoments.description: Hammond gives the Straw Hats a choice: join the New Fish-Man Pirates as subordinates or be destroyed.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hammond's role as an antagonist and sets up the immediate conflict at Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.quote: You have two choices: join us as subordinates, or be sunk right here!

abilities.description: As a fish-man, Hammond possesses strength ten times that of an average human.

relationships.description: Hammond confronts Luffy and the Straw Hats, offering them an ultimatum to join the New Fish-Man Pirates or be destroyed.

evolutionMoments.description: Hammond establishes himself as an antagonist by confronting the Straw Hats at Fish-Man Island's entrance.

reveals.information: Member of the New Fish-Man Pirates
Knows about the Straw Hats' past: defeating Arlong, protecting Hatchan, and assaulting a World Noble

keyMoments.title: Ankoro Attempts to Eat the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Ankoro, a giant anglerfish under Vander Decken IX's command, tries to devour the Thousand Sunny but is stopped by Wadatsumi.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of another dangerous sea creature serving Vander Decken IX.

relationships.description: Ankoro serves under Vander Decken IX as one of his giant sea creature servants.

evolutionMoments.description: Ankoro is shown as one of Vander Decken IX's controlled sea creatures.

keyMoments.title: Green Star: Sargasso Debut
keyMoments.description: Usopp debuts his new Pop Green technique 'Sargasso', firing a seed that explodes into a massive array of resilient seaweed strong enough to hold back an underwater avalanche.
keyMoments.significance: First use of the Sargasso technique, showcasing Usopp's growth and new abilities after the two-year time skip.

abilities.description: Usopp fires a Pop Green that explodes into an array of resilient seaweed, strong enough to delay an avalanche of rock and earth.

reveals.information: Can use Green Star: Sargasso to create defensive seaweed barriers

keyMoments.title: Surume Defeats Wadatsumi
keyMoments.description: Surume intercepts and defeats Wadatsumi with a powerful punch, protecting the Thousand Sunny from destruction.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Surume's loyalty to Luffy and his immense strength.

keyMoments.title: Surume Knocked Unconscious
keyMoments.description: A large rock strikes Surume's head during the celebration, knocking him unconscious and leaving the crew vulnerable.
keyMoments.significance: Loss of the crew's protector at a critical moment.
